name: iNFLUENCE (itch) (Grayday)
description:
You are an influencer. 

Gather as many likes and followers as you can in order to be seen by the world. Spread your influence to those around you and amass the largest following in your social media space.

Controls:

- WASD to Move

- Mouse to control Target  (The target represents the audience your content is currently catering to. Those who are in the target will increase their level of engagement over time, give you likes, and eventually become followers. Those who are not in the target will decrease engagement over time and eventually unfollow you if they were already a follower.

Your goal is to get more followers, but you must balance expansion with retaining your current audience in order to succeed.

Good luck out there!
